webscript.description:
The script looks for the latest available currency rate with date which is equals or less than the date provided as script parameter.
Mandatory parameters:
  • baseCurrency - nodeRef of base curency,
  • targetCurrency - nodeRef of target currency,
  • date - the latest date (yyyy-mm-dd) from which to start search
